en.title: **BSc** in Software Engineering
en.info: Wollo University / Kombolcha Institute of Technology
en.text:
I hold a Bachelor of Science degree in Software Engineering from Wollo University, where I developed a strong foundation in software development principles and their real-world applications. My academic focus included:

  • Web development
  • Mobile app development and requirements gathering
  • Designing innovative algorithms for image recognition

I actively participated in research initiatives and contributed to system development through publications presented at top-tier academic conferences.
